conversion_verification.notes: True 3D transformation confirmed with consistent wall heights and isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation; wall thickness and corners are mathematically consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to room configuration and adjacency. Balcony and utility area boundaries match the source plan well.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement (bed, sofa, dining, toilet, washing machine) is highly accurate to the source layout.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting. Absence of text enhances structural clarity.

detected_errors.description: The kitchen sink and burner placement are simplified and slightly shifted compared to the detailed 2D plan.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D conversion that meticulously preserves room proportions, wall geometry, and furniture placement from the original architectural plan.
